programme.desc: One of the world's most influential pastry chefs Sherry Yard, visits the MasterChef kitchen tonight.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S15 Ep25
programme.desc: Host Terry Crews reveals whom America has chosen as the $1 million winner of Season 15; the two-hour finale will feature special guest performers and not-to-be-missed surprises.

programme.title: The Voice S17 Ep09
programme.desc: The Battle Rounds continue as the coaches enlist music industry powerhouses to prepare their artists to go head-to-head in the hopes of advancing to the Knockout Rounds.

programme.title: The Voice S17 Ep10
programme.desc: The Battle Rounds continue as the coaches enlist music industry powerhouses to prepare their artists to go head-to-head in the hopes of advancing to the Knockout Rounds.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: In this love story set amidst America's struggle during the Great Depression of a teenager's adventures as a bounty hunter take an unexpected twist.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

programme.title: Villains (2019)
programme.desc: After a pair of amateur criminals break into a suburban home, they stumble upon a dark secret that two sadistic homeowners will do anything to keep from getting out.

programme.title: Ode to Joy
programme.desc: A man suffers from a serious disease that causes acute narcolepsy. The man develops a variety of techniques to deny himself pleasure, but they're put to a big test when he falls in love.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Aboard the USS Enterprise, a novice crew including a brash James Kirk and Mr. Spock, encounters a Romulan commander whose mission of vengeance threatens all mankind.

programme.title: Archenemy
programme.desc: Max Fist, who claims to be a hero from another dimension who fell through time and space to earth, where he has no powers. No one believes his stories except for a local teen named Hamster.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A Federal Express efficiency expert, who is stranded on a remote island after his plane crashes. Forced to survive in isolation, he undertakes a journey of self-discovery that transforms him.

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

programme.title: The Doorman
programme.desc: A former Marine turned doorman must outsmart and battle a group of art thieves and their ruthless leader while struggling to protect her sister's family.

programme.title: FAST and FURIOUS
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.
